com.amplifyframework.hub

Class HubEventFilters

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amplifyframework.hub.HubEventFilters

  • public final class HubEventFilters
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides some common implementations of the HubEventFilter.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static HubEventFilter all(HubEventFilter... filters)
      Gets a HubEventFilter that returns true if and only if all of the provides filters in the variable argument list return true.
      static HubEventFilter always()
      Gets a HubEventFilter that always always matches the provided event.
      static HubEventFilter and(HubEventFilter leftFilter, HubEventFilter rightFilter)
      Gets a composite HubEventFilter which will return true if both of the provided filters return true.
      static HubEventFilter any(HubEventFilter... filters)
      Gets a HubEventFilter instance that will return true if any of the provided filters returns true.
      static HubEventFilter or(HubEventFilter leftFilter, HubEventFilter rightFilter)
      Gets a composite HubEventFilter which will return true if either of the provided filters return true.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • always

        public static HubEventFilter always()
        Gets a HubEventFilter that always always matches the provided event.
        Returns:
        a filter that always returns true

      • all

        public static HubEventFilter all(HubEventFilter... filters)
        Gets a HubEventFilter that returns true if and only if all of the provides filters in the variable argument list return true.
        Parameters:
        filters - A list of HubEventFilter; if all filters return true for a given event, then the returned filter will do so, as well. If filters is an empty list, then the returned filter will return true. filters may contain null objects, they will be ignored.
        Returns:
        A HubEventFilter which returns true only if all of the provided filters return true, as described

      • any

        public static HubEventFilter any(HubEventFilter... filters)
        Gets a HubEventFilter instance that will return true if any of the provided filters returns true.
        Parameters:
        filters - A variable argument list of filters. If any filter returns true, then the composite filter that is returned will also return true. If the list is empty, then the composite filter will return false, because no filter (not "any") was a match. If a null filter is found in the list, it is ignored / not evaluated.
        Returns:
        A composite HubEventFilter which will return true if and only if one or more of the provided filters returns true

      • and

        public static HubEventFilter and(HubEventFilter leftFilter,
                                 HubEventFilter rightFilter)
        Gets a composite HubEventFilter which will return true if both of the provided filters return true. It is an error to provide a null argument.
        Parameters:
        leftFilter - A non-null HubEventFilter
        rightFilter - A non-null HubEventFilter
        Returns:
        A composite HubEventFilter that will return true if both of the provided filters return true

      • or

        public static HubEventFilter or(HubEventFilter leftFilter,
                                HubEventFilter rightFilter)
        Gets a composite HubEventFilter which will return true if either of the provided filters return true. It is an error to provide a null argument.
        Parameters:
        leftFilter - A non-null HubEventFilter
        rightFilter - A non-null HubEventFilter
        Returns:
        A composite HubEventFilter which will return true if and only if one or both of the provided filters returns true
